answers.answer: You can ask to wait to be induced, most definitely. They can only guess your baby's weight. When they guessed my friend's baby to be over 8 lbs and induced her, her baby ended up being under 7 lbs (she was like 6 lbs 12 ounces or so).Make an educated choice in this matter. Being pregnant following a miscarriage does not make one high risk. The BP can be a problem and so long as they're closely monitoring it, you should be fine.

question: I was due July 29th according to my peroid which has always been on time. After my first U/S they changed my DD to 8/10/09. So I guess technically I am not overdue although I feel I am. title: 1 CM dilated 30% Effaced and possibly overdue???
